long_description: With a more streamlined fit than traditional, bulky PFDs, the low-profile Extrasport Chica PFD is designed to offer comfort and performance during all your paddling adventures. The Extrasport Chica PFD stays securely in place thanks to a thin lower back panel that accommodates canoe and kayak seat backs. Cordura(R) nylon shell offers abrasion-resistance and high durability; side mesh panels enhance ventilation. Front-zip closure allows easy on/off; adjustment system personalizes the fit over the shoulders and across the torso through side adjustment tabs. Webbing waistbelt in a stretch neoprene tunnel with 2 side adjustments prevents PFD from riding up. Reflective accents enhance visibility in dim light; zippered front mesh pocket holds essential gear. Overstock.
short_description: With a more streamlined fit than traditional, bulky PFDs, the low-profile Extrasport Chica PFD is designed to offer comfort and performance during all your paddling adventures.
